{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Beelink BT3 Pro.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Beelink MiniPC, Smart Windows 10 TV Box |homepage = {{ProductPage|}} |pp = http://www.bee-link.com/Beelink-MiniPC-TV-BOX-104-1.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Beelink_BT3_Pro |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Beelink |model = BT3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Pro |revision = (II) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = set top box, media player, mini pc |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;Z8350;x5-Z8350, Cherry Trail, SR2KT; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.44 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;NCEMBSF-64G <!-- eMMC -->; |flash1size = 64 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = BIOS |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ64CVIG <!-- BIOS -->; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-125:P;D9VCT - MT41K256M16TW-125:P - Micron MT41K256M16 (4Gb x16, DDR3L SDRAM); |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Windows;10;Home x64;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, HDMI, |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI 2.0, VGA, SD Card slot, Audio out 3.5mm jack, |addchip = I2S Audio Codec + 1.3W Class AB/D Mono Speaker Amplifier;Realtek;ALC5651;;1; ,,, Video DisplayPort/VGA Converter;Realtek;RTD2166;;1; ,,, <!-- https://mysku.ru/blog/aliexpress/52745.html --> Power Management IC;X-Powers;AXP288;1; <!-- FL2000 - https://xakep.ru/2018/08/06/diy-sdr/ --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2017 |estprice = 150 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B071JNH6JX |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6255 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Adopts Intel Atom x5-Z8350 (2M Cache, up to 1.92 GHz). DDR3 4GB + 64GB disk system, Graphics 400,support the SD card extended to 128GB. *Build-in Win10 Home(64 bit),Support 1000Mbps LAN, Dual-band WiFi 2.4G+5.8G.There is no risk of network crashes and transmission speeds are faster . *Support Dual Output via HDMI and VGA ports connect two monitors,make your job easier. This would be a great help to deal with all kinds of data tables every day. *Support Automatic power-on function, when in case of power failure, the machine will automatically save the document and boot to maximize your work efficiency. *Very Portable Mini Size Computer,1 Year Warranty + Lifetime technical support.please email us or visit beelink official website if you have any questions.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== :[https://www.redeszone.net/beelink/bt3-pro/ ''Beelink BT3 Pro MiniPC'' on '''RedesZone'''] *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 @1.44GHz (Turbo @1.92GHz) :GPU: [[Intel]] HD Graphics 400 (4K UHD, Full HD) *Memory: 64GB (int.), 128GB (SD Card); RAM: 4GB (DDR3L) *WLAN: 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac (AC600 Wi-Fi), Bluetooth 4.0 *Ports: 1x GbE, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0, VGA, HDMI 2.0 *Audio: 3.5mm jack
==See also== *[[Beelink AP34 Pro]] • [[Intel Celeron]] N3450 • [https://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/65434.html Review] *[[Beelink AP42]] • [[Intel Pentium]] N4200 • [https://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/51490.html Review]<!--WiFi Intel 3165D2W--> *[[Beelink BT3 Pro]] • [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 • [https://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/55584.html Review] *[[Beelink BT7]] • *[[Beelink GS1]] • [[Allwinner]] H6 *[[Beelink M1]] • [[Intel Celeron]] N3450 (eMMC [[Toshiba]]) • [https://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/55545.html Review] *[[Beelink Mini MXIII]] • [[Amlogic]] S905X *[[Beelink X2]] • [[Allwinner]] H3 *[[CHUWI HiBox]] • [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 • [https://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/48472.html Review] *Pocket P1 *Pipo X7, X7S, X9, X10 *MeeGoPad T02, T03 *Teclast X98 Pro *Voyo Vbook V2, V1 (eMMC/SSD) • [[Intel Pentium]] N4200 *Vensmile W10 *Wintel Pro CX-W8
